footsie.translation[1].definitions[0].de: an informal name for the FT 100 Share Index
footsie.translation[2].definitions[0].de: an informal name for the FINANCIAL TIMES-STOCK EXCHANGE INDEX OF 100 SHARES (FTSE 100)
footsie.translation[2].definitions[0].ex: The Footsie closed 2.3 points higher at 2,840.0.
an eventual 9.5 point gain on the Footsie to 2600.5
